properties.Name: Madison Candy Factory
properties.Descriptio: “Think about how the current businesses in this building produce value, and contrast these post-Fordist forms of production to the Fordist mode of production that used to inhabit it.

properties.Name: Wil-Mar Neighborhood Center
properties.Descriptio: . Built as a church and now a community center, the building provides a good opportunity to reflect on how the neighborhood has changed.

properties.Name: Power Plant
properties.Descriptio: Think through questions about energy flows through homes and business, inequalities related to the electric grid, and alternative forms of power.

properties.Name: Badger State Shoe Factory
properties.Descriptio: (From Wikipedia) The building was constructed in 1910 after the company had originally expanded its production to Madison in 1900.  designated a landmark by the Madison Landmarks Commission in 1989.
